msg: MPSITE-31: Make arguments of chmod in sshdeploy configurable

author: ltheussl
msg: Remove U from tar options: it makes ssh fail if failonerror=true

author: thorsten
msg: Added a shell script to do some steps of the cocoon update process. Still there are some steps that should rather be done by a script then committer interaction. Updated the readme to state that some steps could be done by the script.
